value.0:
---------------------------------------------------
Kir'nack Arabett
---------------------------------------------------

Feel the scourge slash and burn! See the matron weakness spurn!

Boiling Ice, Freezing Flames..
Glowing Dark, Blinding Grace..
Wise and subtle in her zeal
Terror, so desireable, unreal

Softness of her cruelty...
Nau..
Words.. futility!
One is enough:

Power

---------------------------------------------------
Vesz'fein Qos'Yutsu
---------------------------------------------------

Blood trails from her clever quill,
Scripting sonnet and song, laced with ill will.
Tempt her temper and be entwined
In the entropic ecstasy of her design.
A little taste is all it takes
To win her wrath and be laid to waste.
But like all things dead she has her draw,
That fatal attaction as the tip of the claw.
As a Siren lulls and lures as it sings,
So does she, but it's chaos she brings.
It's never a challenge for her to entice,
Enlisting aide for victory's vice.
She can scream a scandal in the loveliest tone,
And master an empire from atop her throne.
And when silence has settled, those now living at rest,
The legend lives on of our first ilharess.

---------------------------------------------------
Naref Qos'Yutsu
---------------------------------------------------

Not marble, nor the gilded monuments
Of Ilharessen past shall outlive this powerful rhyme;
But you shall shine more bright in these contents
Than unswept stone besmeared with sluttish time,
When chaotic war shall statues overturn,
And broils root out the work of masonry,
Nor Vhaerun's dagger, nor Eilistraee's dance fire shall burn
the living record of your memory.
'Gainst death and all abvious enmity
Shall you pace forth: your praise shall still find room
Even in the eye of all posterity
That wear this world out to the ending doom
So, till the judgement that yourself arise,
You live in this, and dwell in our dark majesty's eyes.


---------------------------------------------------
XÃ¼llae Ouss'ana
---------------------------------------------------
In the chill dark have I great rejoicing
When her servants kill the isles foul peace
The lightnings from black heaven flash crimson
And the fierce shadows roar me their music
Cavern winds shriek through the tunnels mad, opposing
And through all the rivven skies drow blades clash

I love to see the night fall blood-crimson
As I watch her form through the dark flash
And it fills all my cruel heart with rejoicing
And pries wide my mouth with dark music
When I see her so scorn and defy peace
Lolth's lone Hand 'gainst all light opposing

---------------------------------------------------
Xanos Tinnerai
---------------------------------------------------

Fire in her eyes.
Blood pooling below her feet.
A name screamed.
Silence.

----------------------
Serion Vandree:

There is nothing but divine in this dream
Which walks on these grounds where I stand.
A goddess in drow form, a queen over queens,
Influencing the very breath of this metropolis and giving it pulse
Unifying chaos, greed and lust within a couple of words.
She holds this power, whilst accepting the responsibilities
That time waits for no one though she doesn't wait for time
'Cause Lloth is the bitter truth.
She is the venom that comes from her lips,
One whose beauty can't be truly seen without divine eyes.
Nonetheless everyone tries.
Her moon light hair with her rich starless night skin
With a mind that can fill endess novels
And give hue to a colorless world.
Her authority is what sustains, inspires and transfixes all artists
She is the ideal muse, a masterpiece portrait
And the perfect distraction.
A dream figure that couldn't be dreamed by any mortal.


---------------------------------------------------
Kelafein Qos'Yutsu
---------------------------------------------------

Lost in darkness...
Light is not welcomed here
Skin dark like the opaqueness of a shadow...
Eyes seeing all movement
Ears hearing everything
Body posed to pounce
Ready for the final kill
Roaming the streets
A creature of the night
Seeking blood to quench the thrist
Weapons sink into flesh
spilling the sweet blood
Victim lies, slowly dying
Never again to see the light of day
Sunlight starts to creep
Along the ground
Seeking the shadows
The night retreats
As does the creature
Going into hiding
The await the sign
Of the ever dark night

---------------------------------------------------
Nadorhaun Vandree
---------------------------------------------------

May the road rise up to meet you,
May the wind be ever at your back
May the darkness chill your face
And the enemy fall upon your fields
And until we meet again,
May Lloth hold you in the hollow of her hand

May those who love her, love her;
and those who don't love her,
may Loth turn their hearts;
and if she doesn't turn their hearts,
may she turn their ankles
so we'll know them by their limping.
